posts.title: Kôrogi
posts.excerpt: Quote:Kaoru, a woman in her 30s, is married to an older, blind and apparently mute man, whom she cares for in a house in a small coastal town on the Izu Peninsula. She claims to be dependent on him, but what binds them does not seem to be love. In her wandering, Kaoru discovers the …

posts._title: Vicente Aranda – Cambio de sexo AKA Change of Sex (1977)
posts.title: Cambio de sexo
posts.excerpt: Quote:In a small town outside of Barcelona, Spain, José Maria is a teenager with a big problem, he imagines that he is really a woman. While he begins to show his desire to be a woman through his appearance, the reactions within his household make things more difficult for him. His rude father is a …

posts._title: Michel Deville – L’apprenti salaud AKA The Apprentice Heel (1977)
posts.title: L’apprenti salaud
posts.excerpt: Antoine Chapelot, a bachelor in his forties, works in a hardware shop and lives with his mother. Everything changes when he meets Caroline, a teenaged charmer who unwittingly helps him to organize a lucrative real estate scam. While he is on a roll, Antoine decides to pursue the career of a swindler a bit further …

posts._title: Kim Longinotto & Ziba Mir-Hosseini – Divorce Iranian Style (1998)
posts.title: Divorce Iranian Style
posts.excerpt: Quote:Divorce Iranian Style challenges preconceptions about what life is like for women in Iran. The most startling thing about the film is simply that it was made. The filmmakers follow the cases of three women who are attempting to divorce their husbands. Although Iranian religious law frowns on divorce, a man is allowed to claim …

posts._title: Yuriy Norshteyn – Skazka skazok aka Tale of Tales (1979)
posts.title: Skazka skazok
posts.excerpt: Quote:The name Tale of Tales came from a poem of the same name by Turkish poet Nazım Hikmet that Norshteyn loved since 1962.

posts.title: The Poor Little Rich Girl [+extra]
posts.excerpt: Quote:Gwen’s family is rich, but her parents ignore her and most of the servants push her around, so she is lonely and unhappy.
